alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 06 at 11:17AM EST until March 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Maple River at Maple Rapids affecting Clinton County. .Additional rainfall combined with elevated river levels from previous snowmelt may result in flooding. For the Maple River...including Maple Rapids...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Maple River at Maple Rapids. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of County Line Road and a home along County Line Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Maple River Maple Rapid 9.0 8.3 Mon 10 am ES 8.6 8.9 9.0 &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr.
